posts.message: Lets not spread all guys everywhere.. it will become unmanageavlble. We wont know tasks that are spread across billion of chats
You re making it unmanageable
these are all people related to Matomo
Its unmanageable. We need not per projects, but devops should be in devops task group. Others wont see their tasks
We have single task queue.. if we will add everyone everywhere - everyone will fight for resource without central task management system, in private message channels
you are panicing over trivial chat
the project needs to kick start and all relevant personnel need to be there
I am not panicking, i am asking you
Okay. Lets add jarom to tons of other chats?
Sergey - this is starting to annoy me

What? I am giving one order you are giving another, the opposite. i am teaching that we have rules x.y.z, not adding devops to all project channels and 9u are rendering my words = 0. I just want to discuss that.
no - you are being sarcastic everytime and I told you that it annoys people - myself included
No its not sarcasm
and I am not overriding you - to start working with Matomo you will need Jarom
you cannot work without him
Its either devops is sitting in 1 channel and tracking. We create requests there.
Either devops is jumping over tons of chat channel and nothing is done.
no, some projects such as Matomo require close work with DevOps
every website requires a different url of Matomo

Np. They can call - do jitsi. But others need to see that queue is blocked and devops is busy. For that - requester needs to post a ticket card in common channel, so everyone will see - now jarom is busy with that task. Like the mutex, or semaphore.. ignoring task management system - super dangerous for us
invoicer fixes MUST be ready tomorrow
Roger that
thank you !
as early as possiblr
They arent playing fair.. some of bugs are actually present in Artem's version
no worries
we are on it
just dont make my life hard bro
flow with me
I have a shitty political situation that I am getting us out of.... dont make it hard on me
be with me
Sure thing, i am
I have the others on my mind work with me and we will win
We'll focus on delivery and fixes, collect real facts, so it will make us stronger ðŸ’ª
we just need to get the pieces in place
Tomorrow will build full list of fixes and features we applied
please send it in the group (you not me)to show them all the team is on it)
Okay
remember! be cool - dont let them make you angree - they will try!
remember machivelli
Sure. Have a good night! Pls, get some rest as well, we need strength health to withstand
im not resting - Ioll sleep when im dead ;)
Just 1 q.. What if you need to be in office every day at 9-10 am?

Main problem here that at 23+ hours most of our personnel are tired - actively communicating, solving problems from the morning and during the working day.. And all vampires and ghouls - like Stases, or other Mikhails/Leonids - usually wakes up at 23+ to make balagan at night and drain our energy, to make us walking dead at the morning - emotionally drained young people arent working well â¤ï¸â€ðŸ©¹ :-)
Going to sleep ðŸ˜´
no worries
we are on it
we just need to establish out dominance
arnold has a developer he wants to bring to us - but that developer can only do online meeting this week - please insist an in-person meeting is required
I already said so
to arnold

yes and we have interview process, we have a question list, so on.. but, why Leonid is in this process? Arnold is inviting Leonid to it, why do we need that? I really dont want to do any Interview (actually, any discussions) in front of Leonid
I know this is why I am insisting it will take place in my office
so this is Leonid's person?
I dont know
I think so

issue is that orders are going against with what we are aiming to build. yesterday you told find a developers invite them to the group - but we are trying not to do so.. here is the same trick - we are aiming to discuss business things, why do we need developer on that call?)
we just dont define those separation layers good. interview with developer should be one thing, meeting with business should be other meetring
why constantly throw everyone relevant in 1 chat.. i dont get it and never would
how a bout we create a channel for project updates?
all project updates
internal of course
We have such channels.. which role are you interested at?)) Analytics reports? Pm reports? Ml reports?
Daily blockers?
status of each project
every change
for me and victor
Urgents?
forexample now I need to know what is the production status of the CRM (paytrack) and invoicer
Yevgeniy reported

paytrack-invoicer-stg.muzpan.com
@alexeimaslov
> We adjusted our invoicer according to notes of maslov. Also we added timberri,hongkong and dubai nomenclatures. Requesting to check..
yeah saw that -- but I thought for us - management it might be beneficial to have a stream of production status
Almost all our employee is posting a report.. do you want me to direct all that inflow to you?)
meaning what is in production
Many things..
Cant get what is needed.. status updates - which kind of? Handler added? Css style changed?
We re growing it would be impossible for a person to process all inflow
no - latest features sent for customer check, latest version in production, next version will be deployed at...
stuff like that
Only problems? Oh, Only Features? Okay, have an idea - lets makeit into official open project?
We just need to actualize it.. on daily basis
Its impossible to track it in chats.. op would be easier - wdyt?
ok - but to have latests statuses for all ongoing/done projects
Sure.. need to start doing that. Tomorrow will start, lets start with some like invoicer, paytrack, finmart maybe?
yeah but one place to see all statuses
Official openproject, the first one we created. Its just.. we need to embed it into our "anykey operating system" microcode..

Write a business logic for project managers - when and what to do every day, in order to keep info updated,make it mandatory, and collectively it will be updated good i believe. Today its kinda abit abandoned
Will handle it tomorrow.
are you here?
yes

Hello. Want to ask you for advice. Last monthes I have accidental problems with Yevgeniy. Basically he constantly tries to lower down my authority, while buillding his, on contrast. Tries to debate on mine decisions, in face of colleguaes. To create a situations that shows where i am inconfinent, and he is. Want to ask your advice - what should i do with him?
